alert.note: Alert for Bradley; Calhoun; Cleveland; Ouachita (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 17 at 1:57PM CDT until April 17 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Cleveland County in southeastern Arkansas... Northwestern Bradley County in southeastern Arkansas... Northern Calhoun County in southwestern Arkansas... Northeastern Ouachita County in southwestern Arkansas... * Until 245 PM CDT. * At 157 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Highland Industrial Park to 8 miles west of Hampton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Hampton... Bearden... Thornton... Harrell... Highland Industrial Park... Ellisville... Harlow... Hampton Municipal Airport... Lanark... Banks... Tinsman... Amy... Chambersville... Farmville... Eagle Mills... Hopeville... Woodberry... Millville... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
